name: Swiss Gold
description: Swiss Gold is a high-CBD strain from Northern California that is typically classified as a sativa and was bred by the late Lawrence Ringo. Ringo describes the structure of the strain as “pure indica, short and fat.” Swiss Gold regularly tests with CBD:THC ratios of 2:1, and carries an earthy aroma of fresh citrus. The relaxing effects reduce pain and stress while stimulating the appetite, and eventually cradle you to sleep.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Focused, Uplifted, Hungry, Pain, Headaches, Stress, Depression, Inflammation, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Paranoid, Anxious
